column1: 1;"CSS";"Wes Bos' CSS Grid Course";"www.cssgrid.io";"CSS Grid is a brand new layout system in CSS! It's not a framework or library - it's an addition to the language that allows us to quickly create flexible
We can use it to place
column3: align and architect designs that were previously difficult or even impossible with floats or flexbox.

column1: CSS Grid may seem a bit daunting with new syntax and layout ideas
column2: but it's fairly simple and can be broken down into a handful of powerful concepts that when used together will blow your mind and change the way you create layouts for the web forever.";0;"2018-09-19 21:17:37";"2018-09-19 21:17:37"

4;"Pathways";"OSSU Path to a Computer Science Degree";"https://github.com/ossu/computer-science";"The OSSU curriculum is a complete education in computer science using online materials. It's not merely for career training or professional development. It's for those who want a proper

column3: and for those who have the discipline
column5: and (most importantly!) good habits to obtain this education largely on their own
column6: but with support from a worldwide community of fellow learners.

column1: It is designed according to the degree requirements of undergraduate computer science majors
column3: as it is assumed most of the people following this curriculum are already educated outside the field of CS. The courses themselves are among the very best in the world
